findings.description: The CORS misconfiguration allows any origin (including attacker-controlled domains) to make credentialed requests to Plex's WordPress API endpoints, potentially exposing sensitive data or allowing unauthorized actions.
findings.exploitation_steps: 1. Host malicious JavaScript on attacker domain 2. Use XMLHttpRequest/fetch to make credentialed requests to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/ endpoints 3. Extract sensitive data from responses or perform unauthorized API operations with victim's credentials
